00: You are in the park entrance and hear loud stomps getting closer. You better get moving!
01: You walked into the main observatory. There is debris all over the place. Watch your step.
02: You enter the kitchen and see a dinosaur's shadows on the wall. Quick try and hide in the cupboard.
03: Look the rescue helicopter is over there, but it cant find a safe spot to land. You better keep moving.
10: Ewww what is that smell? You look around and find a pile of half eaten human bodies.
11: *RAWR* That must be a T-Rex! Get out of here!
12: You hide in a porta potty. It stinks, but it beats getting eaten.
13: Look some hunting rifles. It wouldn't be a bad idea to take these.
20: 'Hey man, can you help us?' You run into some other survivors.
21: You see a car and start its engine. The engine is loud... maybe that wasn't such a good idea.
22: You made it to the rendezvous point. Hopefully the helicopter gets here soon!
23: There's a pack of velociraptors up ahead. Quick hide behind some trees.
30: You're under a car hiding from a T-Rex, cover yourself in oil so he can't smell you.
31: You try using your phone to call for help, but you can't get any reception.
32: *ouch* You roll your ankle in a pot hole.
33: You feel like this is hopeless and roll up into a ball crying.
